memories.content:
Successfully implemented mcp-sem-4aireporter MCP server with:
- Same structure as mcp-tg-jira-seminarapp 
- Resources instead of tools (following MCP_SPEC.md exactly)
- Proper URI pattern: quality://sem-4aireporter/{data_type}/{project_id}
- Response formats matching spec for requirements, test_cases, bugs, test_executions
- Data fetching from same JIRA/Zephyr APIs with authentication
- Transformation functions for mapping data to spec-compliant schemas
- All code quality checks passing (ruff format + check)
- Server initialization working correctly
memories.context: Completed building mcp-sem-4aireporter following user's Rule #1 and Rule #2
